resources.string: Please wait! We\'re sending your message to the support department...
Your message has been successfully delivered.
Hi, I\'m Sylvester Francis, a freelance MEAN Stack and Android developer/Tech enthusiast.

My journey started off as a curious boy baffled by how computers could simplify our lives. Now I\'m interested in honing my skills to become a better programmer and show other people the wonders that computers are truly capable of.
Take a look at my skills,if you have an interesting app idea or want to meet me to discuss anything tech-related,feel free to contact me.

1. An On-the go tracking application used to track the position of delivery trucks.
 2. Used by Sathya Agencies to track various parameters like current speed,
 position,idling time of their delivery trucks.
 3. Allows the firm to maintain good customer relations by predicting the estimated time of delivery of their goods.

1.Working as an Android Developer and Web Developer at Sathya Technosoft 
 2.Responsible for development and maintenance of SmarterPing an Android Application used to track delivery trucks. 
 3.Also part of the team responsible for maintaining https://www.sathya.in
Digital Meridian Technology Solutions Private Limited - Freelance MEAN Stack Developer

1.Worked as a Freelance MEAN Stack Developer 
 2.Played a pivotal role in building a MEAN Stack ERP solution for an Automobile parts manufacturing company 
 3.Providing Tech-Support for the above mentioned solution
